I created a game, why can't I draw any items?
All players must join a game before you can make any draws. Also, you can only draw items once it is your turn!

All players joined, but I cannot draw items, only choose tech?
You can only draw items once it is your turn! All players must end their turn once they are finished.

How do I create a game
You need to create a user, and login. Then the Create a game button appears.

How do I join a game
You need to create a user, and login. Then the join button appears in the list of active games. Press that button and you will join.

How do I add a new map?
  • Go in the Map tab in the game you wish to edit
  • You need a Google account
  • Push options -> open editor
  • Make a copy of your own (File -> copy)
  • Make it public to read (File -> Share)
  • Copy the URL and save it into the form
  • A read only view should now appear
  • Share the URL in the chat and give edit access to all players, so everyone can participate in editing the map

How do I add a new asset?
  • Go in the Asset tab in the game you wish to edit
  • You need a Google account
  • Push the Asset Template link
  • Make a copy of your own (File -> copy)
  • Make it public to read (File -> Share)
  • Publish to the Web (File -> Publish to the web)
    • Choose Embed
    • Make sure "Automatically republish when changes are made" is ticked
    • Press the publish button
  • Copy the URL and save it into the form
  • A read only view should now appear
  • Share the URL in the chat so players can request edit access, or give them access if you have their email address so everyone can participate in editing the file
